akas: The Secret Life of Primates World-wide (English title)
akas from release info: The Secret Life of Primates World-wide (English title)

1.title: Chimps

episode of.title: The Secret Life of Primates (TV Mini-Series 2009– )

1.plot: Primatologist Charlotte Uhlenbroek comes face to face with some of the world's greatest primates. Here, she's in Uganda for a close encounter with a group of wild chimpanzees.

2.title: Baboons

episode of.title: The Secret Life of Primates (TV Mini-Series 2009– )

2.plot: Charlotte Uhlenbroek travels to Tanzania for a close encounter with a troop of wild baboons.

3.title: Orangutans

episode of.title: The Secret Life of Primates (TV Mini-Series 2009– )

3.plot: The orangutan is highly endangered, having lost nearly all its forests over Asia and rapidly still more to plantations. Conservation will only save it if programs are developed to reintroduce captivity-bred apes to the remaining wild tracts. Such a program in Sabah (northern Malaysian Borneo) shows how complex and hard to learn their lives are, requiring intricate knowledge of the forest, such as edible plants and when they bear fruit, while Charlotte demonstrates her utter ignorance.

4.title: Gorillas

episode of.title: The Secret Life of Primates (TV Mini-Series 2009– )

4.plot: Charlotte's team joins a German zoologist with a ludicrously large local escort to study mountain gorillas in an Uganda forest reserve, demonstrating her ignorance about that environment as well as poor practical planning. The apes prove rather elusive and the jungle weather a terrible spotting-spoilsport. The family of 17 has a rather strict hierarchy where only the youngsters enjoy exemption from the rule of the biggest. The system makes the silver-back their benign despot as well as protector, with two black-back males in waiting, yet the most enterprising one ...

imdb.plot outline: This brand new documentary series sees renowned primatologist Charlotte Uhlenbroek undertake one of the biggest challenges of her career. Over four episodes, Charlotte travels the world on a quest that brings her face to face with some of the world's greatest primates.
